name: CoilSnake
tagline: A tool for modifying the EarthBound ROM image.
body:
**CoilSnake** is a tool for modifying the ROM image of the 1995 Super Nintendo game *EarthBound*. It allows users to first extract data from the ROM image, then modify the extracted data, and finally re-compile the data into a new ROM image. CoilSnake supports modification of most of the data in the game, such as:
* sprites
* maps
* script and text
* battle backgrounds
* items
* enemies
* and more!

### Support or Contact
For information about getting started with CoilSnake, please see the [EB Hacking 101](http://www.lyros.net/files/EBHack101.pdf) guide, created by [Lyrositor](https://github.com/Lyrositor).

Having trouble with CoilSnake? Create an issue on [GitHub](https://github.com/pk-hack/CoilSnake/issues) or consult the [PK Hack forum](forum.starmen.net/forum/Community/PKHack) and someone will help you sort it out.
